descriptionHtml:
[color=#e69138][size=5]This mod adds some indigestion to most of the NPCs in Skyrim.  In other words, they now burp and fart.  This is especially so when they are eating, exerting large amounts of effort (swinging a weapon), or when they discuss parts of the civil war with you.

Yes, some of the sounds I created myself using my own indigestion.  I won't tell you which ones.  :)

Requires:
[/size][/color][list]
[*][color=#e69138][size=5]Nothing special[/size][/color]
[/list][color=#e69138][size=5]
Credits:
[/size][/color][list]

[/list][color=#e69138][size=5]

[/size][/color]
author: AlpineYJ
